actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for additional creditable service, for purposes of retirement, for certain employees of the Post Office Department.

summary.text: Requires that substitute postal employees be given credit for retirement purposes for services performed in excess of 40 hours per week before the effective date of the Federal Employees Salary Act of 1965, provided that the employing agency deducted, for purposes of retirement, amounts from the compensation paid for such service. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8332)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for additional creditable service, for purposes of retirement, for certain employees of the Post Office Department.
